[vc_row][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_fancy_title font_family=”none”]

Consultancy Services

[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1669276284305{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Are you seeking advice on a strata matter?

Our strata managers are available to provide advice on a range of issues, including:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][mk_custom_list]

  • Strata lot boundaries/ division of lots and common property
  • Interpretation of strata by-laws
  • General meeting/ voting procedures & entitlements
  • Budgeting and determination of strata levies
  • Insurance requirements for strata & survey-strata properties
[/mk_custom_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1669277047920{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Please contact our office for a free quote and we would be glad to assist.

 

Note: John Dethridge Strata Services is not a law firm and is not qualified to provide legal advice. Any advice given is not, and is not intended to constitute legal advice. Should you require legal advice, we can refer you to several lawyers who specialise in strata titles disputes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
